Question
========

In a clinical study men and women are randomly assigned to one of four treatments for anxiety complaints. At the end of the treatment period, anxiety complaints are measured by means of a questionnaire. Which analysis technique should be used to investigate whether the four treatments are equally effective, and whether this differs for men and women?
  
Answerlist
----------
* Multiple logistic regression
* ANCOVA
* Twoway ANOVA
* Oneway ANOVA


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
* Incorrect
